page.title: 04Beningbrough village
page.content: Beningbrough is a very small village. There are 7 houses 3 of which are farms and one agricultural engineer. {Holly tree farm. Mr Wilson has 1600 pigs the pigs get weaned at 3 weeks they are parted from their mother when they are weaned.Mr Wilson has worked with pigs for 20 years there are 11 houses for the pigs they get moved up in stages to different houses they get different food in each house.The pigs go to York live stock market to be slaughterd.Mr Wilson also grows cash crops of wheat,barley,oil seed rape and keeps 45 ewes to eat the grass near the river.All the slurry goes to a big tank it holds 25000 litres he puts it on the land.
